name: Kaka
description: Inherits **12%** of the Wanderer's flame, ice, volt and physical ATK. Kaka has **1** module spot and **5** skill points.
advancements: Increase attack inheritance to **18%**, increase Kaka Collision damage to **1147%** of ATK, Kaka now has **2** module spots and **8** skill points.
Increase attack inheritance to **24%**, increase Kaka Strike damage to **744%** of ATK, Kaka now has **3** module spots and **11** skill points.
Increase attack inheritance to **30%**, increase Kaka Laser damage to **2420%** of ATK, health restoration is increased to **140%** of ATK, Kaka now has **4** module spots and **15** skill points.

abilities.name: Kaka Collision
abilities.effect: Kaka dashes forward, dealing damage to the enemy in front equal to **765%** of ATK, and increase its own attack power by **10%** for 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Kaka Laser
abilities.effect: Kaka accumulates power for a period of time, then send a concentrated laser forward, dealing damage equal to **613%** of ATK to the enemy in front, and restore the owners HP by **80%** of ATK.

abilities.name: Kaka Strike
abilities.effect: Kaka swings his fists forward, hitting the enemy twice. Each hit deals damage equal to **496%** of ATK.
